data.title: Kids and families' games on PS Plus Game Catalog - Guides & Editorial | PlayStation
data.meta_description: Get the whole family together and explore a great range of games to suit kids and teens, all available to download now on PlayStation Plus Game Catalog.
data.text:
Ratchet and Clank: Rift Apart

Jump through space and time in this spectacular interdimensional adventure. Play as Ratchet and newcomer Rivet as you pursue Dr Nefarious across the omniverse. Warp across battlefields at mind-blowing speeds and harness the series’ most outrageous arsenal yet in a dazzling joyride that takes full advantage of the PlayStation 5 console's power.

A Hat in Time

The early years of 3D platforming inspire this eclectic and eccentric tale of Hat Girl and her search for the missing Time Pieces. Stitch together new hats that will allow you to explore every corner of a planet rich with interesting characters to meet, delightful biomes to explore and magical missions to complete.

Monster Boy and the Cursed Kingdom

A spiritual successor to the classic Wonder Boy series, this action adventure combines gorgeous hand-drawn artwork with a classic side-scrolling exploration adventure. Equal parts whimsical and action-packed, this is the perfect introduction to the genre for younger players.

Overcooked 2

Put together your restaurant dream team as you and your buddies race against the clock to create dishes in increasingly weird and challenging scenarios. Cook soup on rafts, prepare sushi in hot air balloons and make burritos in mines, in this co-op restaurant riot.

Monopoly Madness

Discover an even more frantic and fast-paced twist on the beloved board game. In this chaotic version of Monopoly, you can mess with your opponents, ride a bulldozer or even destroy properties with a jackhammer. A smart modern twist on a timeless classic.

Sackboy: A Big Adventure

Everyone’s favorite member of the sack-folk returns in a collision of colorful co-op platforming. Team up alongside your family in this fun-filled adventure as you work together to conquer a host of delightfully crafty levels and defeat the villainous Vex.

Rabbids Invasion: The Interactive TV Show

Interact, play and say “bwaah” through 20 special episodes of hit animated TV show Rabbids Invasion. Have fun with the Rabbids as the episodes play out, competing against friends and family with over 400 full-motion activities.

Bugsnax

Journey to the mythical Snakooth Island and encounter all manner of fantastical, food-inspired flora and fauna. Track and capture adorable half-bug, half-snack creatures in this brightly coloured and darkly humorous solo adventure.

My Little Pony: A Maretime Bay Adventure

Harness Sunny’s magical powers as you help to throw the most dazzling celebration that Equestria has ever seen. Organize fashion shows, compete in fun-filled multiplayer mini games and fly with Pegasi in an adventure full of fun and good friends.

Untitled Goose Game

In this playful puzzle adventure you’ll waddle into the webbed toes of a particularly naughty goose as you wreak havoc across a sleepy English village. Honk and hiss your way through a series of hilarious scenarios alone or with a fine-feathered friend.

Carto

Step inside a charming and colorful adventure as you attempt to reunite Carto with her worried grandmother after a violent storm. Map out and manipulate the mysterious lands you discover using her world-altering abilities, as a cast of quirky characters and delightful creatures help to bring Carto home.

Tearaway Unfolded

Work together with Atoi the Messenger as she journeys through a strange and magical land made entirely from paper in a quest to deliver a secret message. While you play, a second player can decorate the world with designs and photos via a smartphone or tablet.

Röki

Discover a world of myths and monsters in this enchanting and heartwarming modern fairy tale. Explore a stunning snowcapped wilderness, solve puzzles, collect curiosities and harness magic as you uncover the secret’s of Tove's past.

Cartoon Network: Battle Crashers

This modern twist on the retro side-scrolling fighter sees players choose their brawler from a selection of beloved Cartoon Network shows like Adventure Time, Steven Universe and Clarence. Battle across multiple cartoon dimensions in this satisfying co-op caper.

Tinykin

Play as the ant-sized Milo as you team up with mysterious creatures called Tinykin and discover a vast - and strangely familiar - world. Explore insect-filled cities by harnessing the Tinykin’s unique powers to create ladders, build bridges and even skateboard your way across a vibrant and fun-filled house.

The LEGO Movie Video Game

Join unlikely hero Emmet on an unforgettable journey in this expansive adaptation of the blockbuster film. Choose between over 90 different playable characters as you attempt to thwart Lord Business’ evil plans with the help of everyone from Batman to Shakespeare.

Paw Patrol Mighty Pups: Save Adventure Bay!

A mighty meteor has crashed into Adventure Bay, leaving the place in a mess. The plus side? The meteor’s also given everyone’s favourite pups new powers! Embark on colorful co-op adventures and fur-filled minigames as you save the town with your newly powered-up pups.
